name: Turkey's Time
description:
Turkey's Time was created as an educational group project. It is a Thanksgiving themed 2d-platformer where it is the "turkey's time" to have a feast.

Controls-

Move Left: Left Arrow Key

Move Right: Right Arrow Key

Jump: Space Bar

Glide: Hold Space Bar (after falling)

*On screen buttons require use of the cursor

Credits-

Art:  Gaya Sorek

Music/Sound:  Alexander Wise

Level Design/Programming: Josh Dow

Attributions-
